mapper.sql: SELECT id, ip_address, block_reason, block_type, expire_time, hit_count, last_hit_time, status, remark, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM ws_ip_blacklist
mapper.select: WHERE ip_address = #{ipAddress} AND status = 1 AND del_flag = 0 AND (expire_time IS NULL OR expire_time > NOW())
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ws_ip_blacklist ( ip_address, block_reason, block_type, expire_time, hit_count, status, remark, del_flag, create_by, create_time ) VALUES ( #{ipAddress}, #{blockReason}, #{blockType}, #{expireTime}, 0, #{status}, #{remark}, 0, #{createBy}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ws_ip_blacklist SET del_flag = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE ws_ip_blacklist SET status = 0, update_time = NOW() WHERE ip_address = #{ipAddress} AND del_flag = 0
